title: Hashitte Yuke Dokomademo
original_name: はしってゆけどこまでも
sinopse:
Kobato Mebaru's first tankoubon; contains five oneshots that originally ran in Comic Magazine LYNX as well as short after-stories for each chapter.

Hashitteyuke Doko Made mo
(Tsubame-kun no Shuushoku)
Boku mo Aishite
(Washi mo Aishiteru Zoi)
Orange
(Koubutsu wa Saigo ni Taberu Type)
Hoshizora Gohan
(in the Shachou Shitsu)
Honwaka
(Gaman Kurabe)
